events.name: U.S. Decision to Send Cluster Munitions to Ukraine
events.wd_label: U.S. Decision to Send Cluster Munitions to Ukraine
events.wd_description: The United States has decided to send cluster munitions to Ukraine as part of a new military aid package, despite the weapons being banned by 100 countries, including U.S. allies.
events.description: The United States has decided to send cluster munitions to Ukraine as part of a new military aid package, despite the weapons being banned by 100 countries, including U.S. allies.

events.name: Approval by President Joe Biden
events.wd_description: President Joe Biden approved the transfer of cluster munitions to Ukraine after months of debates.
events.description: President Joe Biden approved the transfer of cluster munitions to Ukraine after months of debates.

events.name: Military Aid Package Details
events.wd_description: The cluster munitions will be compatible with the 155 mm howitzers previously provided by the United States, which have been instrumental in Ukraine's efforts to reclaim territory.
events.description: The cluster munitions will be compatible with the 155 mm howitzers previously provided by the United States, which have been instrumental in Ukraine's efforts to reclaim territory.

events.name: Assurances from Ukraine
events.wd_description: Ukraine has assured the United States that the cluster munitions will not be used in urban areas populated by civilians.
events.description: Ukraine has assured the United States that the cluster munitions will not be used in urban areas populated by civilians.

events.name: South Korea Increases Humanitarian Aid to Ukraine
events.wd_label: South Korea Increases Humanitarian Aid to Ukraine
events.wd_description: South Korean President Yoon Suk-Yeol has promised to increase humanitarian and non-lethal military assistance to Ukraine following a summit with Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy.
events.description: South Korean President Yoon Suk-Yeol has promised to increase humanitarian and non-lethal military assistance to Ukraine following a summit with Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy.

events.name: Humanitarian Aid Commitment
events.wd_description: South Korea will increase its humanitarian aid to Ukraine to $150 million in 2023.
events.description: South Korea will increase its humanitarian aid to Ukraine to $150 million in 2023.

events.name: Non-Lethal Military Assistance
events.wd_description: South Korea will provide additional non-lethal military assistance to Ukraine, including vehicles and demining equipment.
events.description: South Korea will provide additional non-lethal military assistance to Ukraine, including vehicles and demining equipment.

events.name: Visit to Ukraine
events.wd_description: President Yoon Suk-Yeol and his wife, Kim Keon-Hee, visited Ukraine after attending the NATO summit in Lithuania, marking Yoon's first visit to Ukraine since the Russian invasion.
events.description: President Yoon Suk-Yeol and his wife, Kim Keon-Hee, visited Ukraine after attending the NATO summit in Lithuania, marking Yoon's first visit to Ukraine since the Russian invasion.

events.name: South Korea's Policy on Lethal Weapons
events.wd_label: South Korea's Policy on Lethal Weapons
events.wd_description: South Korea maintains a policy of not supplying lethal weapons to active conflict zones, despite being the world’s ninth-largest arms exporter.
events.description: South Korea maintains a policy of not supplying lethal weapons to active conflict zones, despite being the world’s ninth-largest arms exporter.

events.name: Record flooding in Delhi due to Yamuna River overflow
events.wd_label: Record flooding in Delhi due to Yamuna River overflow
events.wd_description: The Yamuna River overflowed to its highest level in nearly 45 years, causing severe flooding in Delhi, leading to mass evacuations and major disruptions.
events.description: The Yamuna River overflowed to its highest level in nearly 45 years, causing severe flooding in Delhi, leading to mass evacuations and major disruptions.

events.name: Record rainfall in Northern India
events.wd_description: Northern India experienced record rainfall during the monsoon season, with 88 deaths in Himachal Pradesh and severe flooding in Punjab and Haryana.
events.description: Northern India experienced record rainfall during the monsoon season, with 88 deaths in Himachal Pradesh and severe flooding in Punjab and Haryana.

events.name: Yamuna River overflow
events.wd_description: The Yamuna River's water level rose to 208.46 meters, the highest in 45 years, flooding low-lying areas and roadways in Delhi.
events.description: The Yamuna River's water level rose to 208.46 meters, the highest in 45 years, flooding low-lying areas and roadways in Delhi.

events.name: Delhi flooding
events.wd_description: Severe flooding in Delhi due to the Yamuna River overflow led to the evacuation of nearly 16,000 people, rerouting of traffic, and ongoing rescue efforts.
events.description: Severe flooding in Delhi due to the Yamuna River overflow led to the evacuation of nearly 16,000 people, rerouting of traffic, and ongoing rescue efforts.

events.name: Panasonic's EV Battery Expansion Plans
events.wd_description: Panasonic aims to significantly boost its annual capacity of batteries for electric vehicles (EVs) to 200 gigawatt hours (GWh) by 2031, which will require building four additional factories.
events.description: Panasonic aims to significantly boost its annual capacity of batteries for electric vehicles (EVs) to 200 gigawatt hours (GWh) by 2031, which will require building four additional factories.

events.name: Current Capacity and Expansion
events.wd_description: Panasonic Energy currently has a plant in Nevada and is building a second plant in Kansas, aiming to increase its capacity to 80 GWh.
events.description: Panasonic Energy currently has a plant in Nevada and is building a second plant in Kansas, aiming to increase its capacity to 80 GWh.

events.name: Future Factories
events.wd_description: Panasonic will need to build around four more factories to reach its target of 200 GWh annual capacity by 2031.
events.description: Panasonic will need to build around four more factories to reach its target of 200 GWh annual capacity by 2031.

events.name: Joint Ventures and Partnerships
events.wd_description: Panasonic is open to potential joint ventures for EV battery production, including a possible partnership with Mazda, and emphasizes the changing nature of investment in such projects.
events.description: Panasonic is open to potential joint ventures for EV battery production, including a possible partnership with Mazda, and emphasizes the changing nature of investment in such projects.

events.name: Focus on North American Production
events.wd_description: Panasonic is focusing on North America to build up capacity for the production of 4680 batteries, the newest cells championed by Tesla.
events.description: Panasonic is focusing on North America to build up capacity for the production of 4680 batteries, the newest cells championed by Tesla.

events.name: New Factories in North America
events.wd_description: Panasonic plans to build at least two new factories for 4680 battery production in North America by 2030, with Oklahoma as a possible site.
events.description: Panasonic plans to build at least two new factories for 4680 battery production in North America by 2030, with Oklahoma as a possible site.

events.name: Supply Chain Considerations
events.wd_description: The new plants will need to be supported by about a dozen factories of materials suppliers, following the principle of "local production for local consumption."
events.description: The new plants will need to be supported by about a dozen factories of materials suppliers, following the principle of "local production for local consumption."

events.name: Joint Procurement
events.wd_description: Joint procurement with major customers could be considered, taking into account tax breaks under the U.S. Inflation Reduction Act (IRA) and the need to limit the carbon footprint.
events.description: Joint procurement with major customers could be considered, taking into account tax breaks under the U.S. Inflation Reduction Act (IRA) and the need to limit the carbon footprint.

events.name: Partnership with Mazda
events.wd_description: Panasonic and Mazda are working on setting up a partnership to supply Mazda with cylindrical lithium-ion batteries made in Japan and North America.
events.description: Panasonic and Mazda are working on setting up a partnership to supply Mazda with cylindrical lithium-ion batteries made in Japan and North America.

events.name: Partnership Talks
events.wd_description: Panasonic and Mazda are holding talks to set up a supply partnership, with an agreement expected to be signed by the end of the year.
events.description: Panasonic and Mazda are holding talks to set up a supply partnership, with an agreement expected to be signed by the end of the year.

events.name: Future Supply Plans
events.wd_description: The partnership aims to supply batteries to Mazda after 2025, supporting the automaker’s EV production.
events.description: The partnership aims to supply batteries to Mazda after 2025, supporting the automaker’s EV production.
